metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18604 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In axohelp.c before 1.3 in axohelp in axodraw2 before 2.1.1b, as distributed in TeXLive and other collections, sprintf is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-18604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libkpathsea6 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libptexenc1 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libsynctex2 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libtexlua53 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libtexluajit2 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
texlive-binaries - 2020.20200327.54578-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.20200327.54578-5').
